cancelBid(uint256,uint256).details: Cancels a trade by the poster.

params._trade: The trade that contain the bid to be cancelled.

cancelTrade(uint256).details: Cancels a trade by the poster.

executeBid(uint256,uint256).details: Executes a trade. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the poster. Transfers ownership of the item to the filler.

params._trade: The id of an existing trade

executeTrade(uint256).details: Executes a trade. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the poster. Transfers ownership of the item to the filler.

params._trade: The id of an existing trade

getBid(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the details for a bid.

getTrade(uint256).details: Returns the details for a trade.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

openBid(uint256,uint256,bytes32).details: Opens a new bid. Puts _item in escrow.

params._item: The id for the item to bid on.
params._price: The amount of currency for which to bid the item.
params._visibility: The visibility for which to bid the item.

openTrade(uint256,uint256,bytes32).details: Opens a new trade. Puts _item in escrow.

params._item: The id for the item to trade.
params._price: The amount of currency for which to trade the item.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxyOwner().details: Tells the address of the owner

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: Implements the classifieds board market. The market will be governed by an ERC20 token as currency, and an ERC721 token that represents the ownership of the items being traded. Only ads for selling items are implemented. The item tokenization is responsibility of the ERC721 contract which should encode any item details.
